Welcome to DroneBoi vehicles and Modular Spaceships Editor

What is it?

Outdated description, but anyway... It is a fan made art as opensource tool for modifying and creating (also) Droneboi Vehicles online, recreation of the game editor using the same assets. DBC (DB as DroneBoi shortly, a fourth title of DB series) is the ultimate open-world sandbox space drone building, exploration, and combat mobile game made by Rizen Planet Studios. Compared to the game which focuses on gameplay, this webapp is planned to provide rich spaceship external editor with many building functions, more powerfull and customizable tools for advanced drone designs. It is currently in development. First thanks to God that we can enjoy and share interests in such Droneboi community being in care of Beau and incredible thanks to him for upkeeping the game series, similar or same assets and theme are used from Rizen Planet Studios Droneboi games for authentic building experience. Thanks to the DBVE contributors and for feedback from also others. Most of the icons are made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com: Refresh, Paint created by Freepik, Clone created by NickyLimYeanFen, Anchor tool created by riajulislam, Eraser created by Those Icons Book timer created by Fhmrvi94 School icon created by Yogi Aprelliyanto Save icons created by Freepik - Flaticon Search icons created by Chanut - Flaticon

How to use it?

Exporting feature is limited to existing blocks and usuall positions/rotations beacause of that, it is still not approved as ban safe. While holding mouse and moving view position is grabbed and moves. Scroll to zoom in/out. Open contextmenu, which is usually done by pressing right mouse button, to also open commands tab where you were pointing. There is list of commads, used to change settings or enable different tools. They show their description when they are opened. Click on Welcome message to close it, rightclicking around to open commands tab also closes Welcome message.

What's new?

You may be able to find more up to date information, report bugs, suggest or just discuss features in Discord server dedicated to DBVE: Deltarealm fanclub .
